video.title: Zoo
video.synopsis: When animal species all over the world begin attacking humans, controversial zoologist Jackson Oz tries to discover the cause of the sudden change.

episodes.synopsis: Zoologist Jackson Oz and journalist Jamie Campbell investigate the first ominous attacks in what appears to be an animal revolt against humankind.
episodes.title: First Blood

episodes.synopsis: Jackson saves a friend held hostage by lions. Meanwhile, Jamie and Mitch uncover evidence of a lion hive mind and a possible pesticide connection.
episodes.title: Fight or Flight

episodes.synopsis: A bat attack causes Jackson and Abraham's plane to crash, Chloe investigates dog assaults, and Jamie and Mitch hit a wall with Sen. Vaughn.
episodes.title: The Silence of the Cicadas

episodes.synopsis: Mitch, Abraham and FBI agent Ben Shaffer investigate the wolf attacks at the Mississippi prison, and bats swarm an Antarctic research station.
episodes.title: Pack Mentality

episodes.synopsis: Mitch makes the connection between bacteria found in the wolf and Reiden. Meanwhile, a team in Rio fights bats that can attack in daylight.
episodes.title: Blame It on Leo

episodes.synopsis: Hartley seeks an optometrist's help in becoming like the affected animals, which leads to a life-or-death chase for the mother cell.
episodes.title: This Is What It Sounds Like

episodes.synopsis: Jamie searches Reiden's Paris offices for proof of their connection to Ben. Meanwhile, Mitch sees the mother cell in action on a captured bear.
episodes.title: Sleuths

episodes.synopsis: A container ship's crew is slaughtered by infected rats, which are unleashed on the mainland when the unmanned craft runs aground.
episodes.title: The Cheese Stands Alone

episodes.synopsis: Mitch tries to create an antidote to the mutations. Meanwhile, Burke attempts to retrieve the mother cell and the authorities pursue Chloe and Jamie.
episodes.title: Murmuration

episodes.synopsis: The team seeks an animal rights activist's help in fleeing Zambia after they secretly obtain the DNA of a leopard.
episodes.title: Emotional Contagion

episodes.synopsis: Things go from bad to worse when Jackson is hurt during the team's flight from Zambia and the hospital turns out to be overrun with mutated animals.
episodes.title: Eats, Shoots and Leaves

episodes.synopsis: While Jackson is undergoing surgery, Mitch and Jamie work with the leopard DNA and the mother cell to create a cure for the mutations.
episodes.title: Wild Things

episodes.synopsis: Months after the plane crash, the team struggles to find a cure, while the mutated animals wreak havoc on the streets of Washington.
episodes.title: That Great Big Hill of Hope
